The researcher, with the words of a priest, as you call again, a little, what you remember, that is, remember, remember a little While before it, and the readers and the remembrance of faith with the denial of poetry and the remembrance with the denial of the priest, it was said that when the nursery of the Qur’an is not the same A fad (P-54) is an excuse for its claimant to leave faith, and it is more atonement for the disagreement of its intention to the priesthood, so it stands on the remembrance of the Qur’an.The opponent of the way of priesthood and the suffering of their sayings and punishing that that is also what stops the contemplation of a piece of cut The first stops without standing the second.
